metadata.description: Example batch import file with historical figures only

figures.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero
figures.title: Roman Statesman and Orator
figures.description: Roman statesman, lawyer, scholar, and writer who tried to uphold republican principles in the final civil wars

figures.name: Gaius Julius Caesar
figures.title: Roman General and Dictator
figures.description: Roman general and statesman who played a critical role in the events that led to the demise of the Roman Republic

figures.name: Marcus Junius Brutus
figures.title: Roman Senator
figures.description: Roman senator and the most famous of the assassins of Julius Caesar

figures.name: Cleopatra VII
figures.title: Queen of Egypt
figures.description: Last active pharaoh of Ptolemaic Egypt

figures.name: Marcus Antonius
figures.title: Roman Politician and General
figures.description: Roman politician and general who played a key role in the transformation of the Roman Republic from a constitutional republic into the autocratic Roman Empire
